recipe-categories.name: Drinks
recipe-categories.description: Quench your thirst with these refreshing and tasty drink recipes.

recipe-categories.name: Salad
recipe-categories.description: These fresh and flavorful salad recipes are perfect for lunch, dinner, or as a side dish.

recipe-categories.name: Appetizer
recipe-categories.description: Start off your meal with these delicious and easy-to-make appetizers.

recipe-categories.name: Dessert
recipe-categories.description: Satisfy your sweet tooth with these mouth-watering dessert recipes.

recipe-categories.name: Vegetarian
recipe-categories.description: These meatless recipes are perfect for vegetarians and anyone looking to eat more plant-based meals.

recipe-categories.name: Gluten-Free
recipe-categories.description: These recipes are free of gluten, making them a safe and delicious option for those with gluten sensitivities or celiac disease.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A delicious breakfast or snack option made with mashed avocado and toast. Add salt, pepper, and other toppings like eggs or bacon for extra flavor.
instructions: Cut the avocado in half lengthwise, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh out of the skin with a spoon.
Mash the avocado with a fork in a small bowl until it reaches your desired consistency.
Toast two slices of bread to your desired level of crispness.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toast evenly, using about half an avocado per slice of toast.
Sprinkle salt and pepper on top of the avocado to taste.
Add any additional toppings you desire, such as sliced tomatoes, red pepper flakes, or chopped herbs.
Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious avocado toast!

recipes.name: Blueberry Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy and delicious pancakes made with fresh blueberries. Top with maple syrup or whipped cream for a sweet treat.
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
In another bowl, beat the egg and add milk and melted butter.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Fold in the blueberries gently.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and grease lightly with butter or cooking spray.
Using a 1/4 cup measure, pour batter onto the pan for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Repeat until all the batter is used up.
Serve hot with maple syrup and whipped cream if desired.

recipes.name: Egg and Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: A classic breakfast sandwich made with a fried egg, melted cheese, and your choice of bread. Perfect for a quick and easy morning meal.
instructions: In a small bowl, beat the egg and season with salt and black pepper.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add the butter.
When the butter has melted, pour in the beaten egg and cook until set, about 2-3 minutes.
Place a cheese slice on one slice of bread and top with the cooked egg.
Add any optional toppings, such as bacon or avocado, if desired.
Top with the other slice of bread and cut in half.
Serve hot and enjoy your delicious Egg and Cheese Sandwich!

recipes.name: Indian Ghee Dosa
recipes.description: An Indian goto breakfast, which is filling with delicious ingredients and sides of chutney and indian sambar
instructions: Wash the rice and urad dal separately and soak in water for 4-6 hours.
Grind the rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds together into a smooth batter, adding water as needed.
Transfer the batter to a large bowl and add salt, mixing well.
Cover the bowl and let the batter ferment for 6-8 hours or overnight, until it has doubled in volume and has a slightly sour smell.
When ready to cook, heat a non-stick pan or cast iron griddle over medium heat.
Add a spoonful of ghee and spread it evenly on the pan.
Pour a ladleful of batter in the center of the pan and spread it out in a circular motion to make a thin crepe.
Cook until the edges start to lift and the bottom turns golden brown, then flip and cook for a few more seconds on the other side.
Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more ghee to the pan as needed.
Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar, if desired.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.description: A Tex-Mex dish made with marinated and grilled chicken, peppers, onions, and tortillas.
instructions: Cut the chicken into thin strips and place in a large bowl.
Add the olive oil, lime juice, chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper to the bowl and stir to coat the chicken evenly.
Cover the bowl and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or overnight for best results.
Cut the bell peppers and onion into thin strips.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add a tablespoon of olive oil.
Add the sliced peppers and onion to the skillet and sauté for 5-7 minutes, or until they start to soften.
Add the marinated chicken to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until cooked through.
Warm the tortillas in the microwave or on a hot skillet.
Serve the chicken and pepper mixture with warm tortillas and any desired toppings, such as sour cream, guacamole, shredded cheese, or salsa.
Enjoy your delicious Chicken Fajitas!

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: A creamy Italian dish made with Arborio rice, mushrooms, onions, and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: In a small bowl, soak the dried porcini mushrooms in 2 cups of hot water for 20-30 minutes, or until softened. Once softened, drain the mushrooms and reserve the soaking liquid.
Heat the olive oil and butter in a large pot over medium heat.
Add the diced onion and sauté for 3-4 minutes, or until translucent.
Add the Arborio rice to the pot and stir to coat the rice with the oil and butter. Toast the rice for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Pour in the white wine and stir to combine. Cook until the wine is absorbed into the rice.

Add 1 cup of broth to the pot and stir until the broth is absorbed. Repeat this process, adding 1 cup of broth at a time and stirring frequently, until the rice is cooked through and has a creamy consistency. This should take about 20-25 minutes.
While the risotto is cooking, slice the cremini mushrooms and sauté them in a separate pan over medium heat until they are golden brown.
Add the soaked porcini mushrooms, sautéed cremini mushrooms, thyme leaves, and parmesan cheese to the risotto. Stir to combine and add salt and pepper to taste.
If the risotto is too thick, you can add a little more broth or water to thin it out. Serve hot and enjoy your delicious Mushroom Risotto!

recipes.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
recipes.description: A sandwich made with slow-cooked pulled pork, barbecue sauce, and coleslaw.
instructions: Preheat your oven to 250°F (120°C).
Mix together the salt, black pepper, garlic powder, paprika, and onion powder in a small bowl to make a rub for the pork.
Rub the spice mixture all over the pork shoulder, making sure to coat it well.
Place the pork shoulder in a baking dish or Dutch oven and cover it with foil.
Bake in the preheated oven for 6-8 hours, or until the pork is very tender and falls apart easily when pulled with a fork.
Once the pork is done, remove it from the oven and let it cool slightly. Shred the pork using two forks or your hands.
Mix the shredded pork with BBQ sauce in a large bowl, stirring until the pork is well coated with the sauce.
To assemble the sandwich, place a generous amount of pulled pork on the bottom half of each hamburger bun. Top with coleslaw and the top half of the bun.
Serve your delicious BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwiches hot and enjoy!

recipes.name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
recipes.description: A sandwich made with canned tuna, mayonnaise, celery, onion, and spices, served on bread or a roll.
instructions: Drain the canned tuna and transfer it to a large mixing bowl.
Add mayonnaise, celery, red onion, sweet pickle relish, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper. Mix well until everything is combined and the tuna salad is evenly coated.
Place 4 lettuce leaves on a clean work surface. Top each leaf with a scoop of tuna salad.
Place the remaining 4 slices of bread on top of the tuna salad to make 4 sandwiches. Slice each sandwich in half and serve.
Your delicious Tuna Salad Sandwiches are now ready to be enjoyed!

recipes.name: Beef Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A dish made with stir-fried beef, vegetables, and a savory sauce, served over rice.

ingredients.name: beef sirloin, sliced into thin strips

instructions: In a medium bowl, mix together the cornstarch, soy sauce, and sesame oil. Add the beef strips and toss to coat. Let the beef marinate for at least 15 minutes.
Heat a large wok or skillet over high heat. Add vegetable oil and swirl to coat the pan.
Add minced garlic and grated ginger, and stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add the marinated beef to the pan and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until browned on all sides.
Add broccoli, red bell pepper, and sliced carrots to the pan. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Add chopped green onions to the pan and stir-fry for 1 minute until wilted.
Serve the beef stir-fry hot over a bed of cooked rice.
Your delicious Beef Stir-Fry is now ready to be enjoyed!

recipes.name: Hummus and Veggie Plate
recipes.description: A plate of freshly cut vegetables like carrot sticks, cucumbers, and cherry tomatoes served with hummus dip.
instructions: In a food processor, combine the chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and black pepper. Pulse until smooth and creamy.
Transfer the hummus to a serving bowl.
Arrange sliced carrots, celery, red bell pepper, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and pita bread on a large serving plate.
Serve the hummus with the vegetables and pita bread on the side.
Your delicious Hummus and Veggie Plate is now ready to be enjoyed!

recipes.name: Trail Mix
recipes.description: A mixture of nuts, seeds, and dried fruits, often with chocolate or other sweet additions.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Spread the almonds, cashews, pumpkin seeds, and sunflower seeds on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Roast in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until lightly golden and fragrant.
Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes.
In a large bowl, combine the roasted nuts and seeds with the dried cranberries, raisins, and chocolate chips. Mix well.
Transfer the trail mix to an airtight container or small ziplock bags for easy storage and transportation.
Your delicious Trail Mix is now ready to be enjoyed!

recipes.name: Popcorn
recipes.description: A classic snack made by popping kernels of corn in oil or air and adding salt or other seasonings.
instructions: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.
Add the popcorn kernels to the pot and cover with a lid.
Once the kernels start popping, shake the pot gently to make sure all the kernels pop.
Continue to cook until the popping slows down and there are several seconds between pops.
Remove the pot from heat and carefully remove the lid.
Season the popcorn with salt, to taste.
Transfer the popcorn to a large bowl and enjoy!
Your delicious Popcorn is now ready to be enjoyed!

recipes.name: Fruit Salad
recipes.description: A mixture of fresh fruits like strawberries, kiwi, pineapple, and grapes, often dressed with a sweet dressing.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine all the fruits.
Drizzle the honey over the fruits and toss gently to coat.
Sprinkle the chopped mint leaves over the top of the fruit salad.
Serve immediately, or refrigerate until ready to serve.
Your delicious Fruit Salad is now ready to be enjoyed!

recipes.name: Guacamole and Chips
recipes.description: A dip made with mashed avocado, lime juice, and seasonings, served with tortilla chips.
instructions: Cut the avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl.
Mash the avocado with a fork or potato masher until it reaches your desired consistency.
Add the lime juice, red onion, tomato, jalapeno pepper, and garlic to the bowl and stir to combine.
Season with salt, to taste.
Transfer the guacamole to a serving dish and serve with tortilla chips.
Your delicious Guacamole and Chips is now ready to be enjoyed!
